an10.124:4.1: “Mendicants, these ten things don’t arise apart from the Holy One’s training.
an10.124:4.3: Right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right samādhi, right knowledge, and right freedom.
an10.124:4.5: These are the ten things that don’t arise apart from the Holy One’s training.”
